Gene Ontology terms

Source: R/rest-geneOntology.R
geneOntology.Rd

Gene Ontology terms

geneOntology(genes, BPPARAM = BiocParallel::bpparam())

Arguments

genes

character. Gene identifiers.

Value

DataFrame.

Note

Updated 2019-08-29.

Examples

## WormBase REST API must be accessible.
genes <- c("WBGene00000912", "WBGene00004804")
tryCatch(
    expr = geneOntology(genes),
    error = function(e) e
)
